allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Deploy VPS2 auto-reconnection + add FTMO accounts to VPS1/VPS2

## Deployment System Created
- Added deployment helper scripts \(deploy-to-vps.ps1, deploy-all-vps.ps1\)
- Added config generator for VPS5-10 \(create-vps-config.ps1\)
- Added comprehensive documentation \(DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md, QUICK_START.md\)
- Added VPS address mapping with credentials \(vps-addresses.json\)

## VPS Configuration Updates
- Updated VPS1 \(Yojan Forero\): Added FTMO account 531121568 on port 8002
- Updated VPS2 \(Leandro Forero\): Added FTMO account 531121571 on port 8002
- Standardized config format with account_holder, prop_firm, initial_balance
- Updated backend .env to include VPS1-FTMO and VPS2-FTMO endpoints

## VPS2 Deployment Completed
- Successfully deployed auto-reconnection system to VPS2
- Running 3 agents: FivePercent \(8000\), FundedNext \(8001\), FTMO \(8002\)
- Health checks active every 60 seconds
- Firewall rules configured for all ports

## Cleanup
- Removed obsolete Windows service files \(launcher_service.py, WINDOWS_SERVICE_SETUP.md\)

## Monitoring
- VPS1: 3 accounts \(FN: 13911428, T5: 25841531, FTMO: 531121568\)
- VPS2: 3 accounts \(T5: 25841549, FN: 13889597, FTMO: 531121571\)
- Total: 6 accounts being monitored with auto-reconnection

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(wsl -e bash -c "python3 --version 2>&1; pip3 --version 2>&1; which ansible 2>/dev/null || echo ''Ansible not installed''")

Bash(wsl bash -c "source ~/ansible-env/bin/activate && cd /mnt/c/Users/Admin/Projects/Programar_Dia/ansible && ansible vps02 -m win_shell -a ""Get-Content ''C:\\Users\\Administrator\\Desktop\\vps-agent\\logs\\launcher.log'' -Tail 50 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue""")

Bash(wsl bash -c "source ~/ansible-env/bin/activate && cd /mnt/c/Users/Admin/Projects/Programar_Dia/ansible && ansible -i inventory/hosts.yml vps02 -m win_shell -a ""Get-Content ''C:\\Users\\Administrator\\Desktop\\vps-agent\\logs\\launcher.log'' -Tail 50 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue""")

Bash(wsl bash -c "source ~/ansible-env/bin/activate && cd /mnt/c/Users/Admin/Projects/Programar_Dia/ansible && ansible -i inventory/hosts.yml vps02 -m win_shell -a ""Get-ChildItem ''C:\\Users\\Administrator\\Desktop\\vps-agent\\logs'' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object Name,LastWriteTime""")
